translated: Elder Story🔽The Chapter about the Giver of Protection
“There is no footprint in the sky,
in the sky there is no dust;
going in the courtyard of the gods.
Seeing the robe of the Perfect Sambuddha
I had a thought right then,
I do not know of a bad destination,
this is the fruit of perceiving the Buddha.
I have done what the Buddha asked.”🔽Thus the venerable Gatasaññaka spoke these verses.

original: Itthaṁ sudaṁ āyasmā gatasaññako thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.🔽Gatasaññakattherassāpadānaṁ tatiyaṁ.
analyzed: ittham sudam āyasmā gatasaññakaḥ theraḥ imāḥ gāthāyaḥ abhāsittha ati 🔽gatasaññaka therassa apadānam tatiya
translated: The Elder Gatasaññaka’s Story is the third.
